titleStmt.title: The pedigree and perigrination of Israel Being an abridgement of the histories of the creation of Adam. Cain & Abel. Noah. Abraham. Issac. Jacob. Joseph. Joshuah. Deborah. Ruth. Hezekiah. Zedekiah. And the taking of the Arke. With meditations and prayers upon each historie. By John Jackson of Kilingraves in Com. Ebor. Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, John, of Kilingraves.

titleStmt.title: The pedigree and perigrination of Israel Being an abridgement of the histories of the creation of Adam. Cain & Abel. Noah. Abraham. Issac. Jacob. Joseph. Joshuah. Deborah. Ruth. publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons, for John Wilcox, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crown in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: In title, the words "Issac .. Deborah" and "Ruth .. Arke" are in brackets.
